issue.errorLine1: <string name="phone_compass_not_available">Phone compass sensor is not available</string>
<string name="location_setup_description">Локация помогает рассчитать видимую часть неба и подобрать объекты.</string>
<string name="location_setup_manual_hint">Введите координаты в десятичном формате. Например: 55.7558 / 37.6176</string>
<string name="location_setup_lat_error_range">Широта должна быть в диапазоне от -90 до 90.</string>
<string name="location_setup_lon_error_range">Долгота должна быть в диапазоне от -180 до 180.</string>
<string name="location_share_description">Позволяет часам запросить текущие координаты, пока приложение открыто.</string>
<string name="crash_logs_instruction">Для ANR/Crash смотри Play Console → Play Vitals. Здесь — локальные JSONL логи.</string>
<string name="ar_permission_message">Чтобы отобразить камеру и подсказки объектов, приложению нужно разрешение на использование камеры.</string>
<string name="settings_mirror_desc">Отображать данные тайла Tonight на телефоне.</string>
<string name="settings_ar_desc">Показывать режим дополненной реальности на телефоне (нужна камера).</string>
<string name="settings_privacy_redact_desc">Mask sensitive values (e.g., tokens, IDs) in logs and payloads.</string>
<string name="settings_redact_payloads_blocked">Sending raw payloads is disabled by privacy settings</string>

issue.message: This folder configuration (`v26`) is unnecessary; `minSdkVersion` is 26. Merge all the resources in this folder into `mipmap-anydpi`.
Do not place Android context classes in static fields (static reference to `Sender` which has field `context` pointing to `Context`); this is a memory leak
The resource `R.xml.backup_rules` appears to be unused
The resource `R.color.mobile_surface` appears to be unused
The resource `R.color.mobile_on_surface` appears to be unused
The resource `R.mipmap.ic_launcher_round` appears to be unused
The resource `R.string.catalog_debug_self_test_title` appears to be unused
Use version catalog instead (org.jetbrains.kotlinx:kotlinx-serialization-json is already available as `kotlinx-serialization-json`, but using version 1.7.1 instead)
Use version catalog instead (androidx.activity:activity-compose is already available as `androidx-activity-compose`, but using version 1.9.2 instead)
Use version catalog instead (androidx.lifecycle:lifecycle-runtime-compose is already available as `androidx-lifecycle-runtime-compose`, but using version 2.8.5 instead)
Use version catalog instead (androidx.lifecycle:lifecycle-viewmodel-compose is already available as `androidx-lifecycle-viewmodel-compose`, but using version 2.8.5 instead)
Use version catalog instead (com.google.android.gms:play-services-wearable is already available as `play-services-wearable`, but using version 18.2.0 instead)
Use version catalog instead (androidx.compose:compose-bom is already available as `compose-bom`, but using version 2024.09.02 instead)
